slides.title: Welcome to the deck
slides.body: This is the first slide. Define your carousel as HTML/CSS, fill placeholders from JSON, and render to images or PDF with Playwright.

slides.title: How it works
slides.body: 1. Edit templates/slide.html and templates/slide.css. 2. Put your content in a JSON file with a "slides" array. 3. Run: npm run render content/your-content.json

slides.title: Output
slides.body: You get PNG or JPEG per slide in the output folder, plus a single PDF with one page per slide. Use --output to choose the directory, --format jpeg for smaller images, --no-pdf to skip PDF.
